item.description:
Welcome to everyone intrigued by Hypnosis & Neuro-Linguistic Programming (NLP). Here are the details of the November meeting of the Greater Boston Hypnosis and NLP group. [b]This month’s topic:

Topic: Exploring Regression in Hypnosis

Tonight, we explore regression.  Regression is where we go back in time to an event or events in our past.  We go back for purposes of healing or just wonderment.

We will explain the different types of regression, the pros and cons and do's and don'ts.

And we will demonstrate a few of them.


 

 

Kevin Martin, CHT

Hypnotist Positive Effects Methuen, MA (978) 494-4542,  kenda_assoc@msn.com www.poseffects.com

---------------------------------- Helping people to help themselves

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: Lexington-Exploring Hypnotic Regression
